item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, there <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> who were <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.

They <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>; in their <st data-num="05271" class="">youth</st> they <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st>. Their <st data-num="07699" class="">breasts</st> were <st data-num="04600" class="">squeezed</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>; lovers<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">fondled</st> their <st data-num="01331" class="">virgin</st> <st data-num="01717" class="">nipples</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.
Oholah was the name of the older and Oholibah the name of her younger sister. They became mine and gave birth to sons and daughters. Oholah is Samaria, and Oholibah is Jerusalem.
“Oholah engaged in prostitution while she was mine. She lusted after her lovers, the Assyrians—warriors

<st data-num="03847" class="">clothed</st> in <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="06346" class="">governors</st> and <st data-num="05461" class="">officials</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="02531" class="">desirable</st> <st data-num="0970" class="">young men</st>, <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st> <st data-num="07392" class="">riding</st> on <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>.

She <st data-num="05414" class="">bestowed</st> her <st data-num="08457" class="">sexual favors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> them; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them were the <st data-num="04005" class="">choicest</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">young men</st> of <st data-num="0804" class="">Assyria</st>. She <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> herself with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> she <st data-num="05689" class="">desired</st><n id="2" />—with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>.

She did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05800" class="">abandon</st> the <st data-num="08457" class="">prostitution</st> she had practiced in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> in her <st data-num="05271" class="">youth</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">men</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">went to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> her, <st data-num="06213" class="">fondled</st> her <st data-num="01331" class="">virgin</st> <st data-num="01717" class="">breasts</st>, and <st data-num="08210 08457 05921">ravished</st> her.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03651" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="05414" class="">handed</st> her <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> her <st data-num="0157" class="">lovers</st>, the <st data-num="03027 01121 0804">Assyrians</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> she <st data-num="05689" class="">lusted</st>.
They exposed her nakedness, seized her sons and daughters, and killed her with the sword. She became notorious among women, and they executed judgments against her.
“Her sister Oholibah watched this, but she became more corrupt in her lust than her sister had been, and her acts of prostitution were more numerous than those of her sister.

She <st data-num="05689" class="">lusted</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="01121 0804">Assyrians</st>—<st data-num="06346" class="">governors</st> and <st data-num="05461" class="">officials</st>, warriors in <st data-num="04358" class="">full</st> <st data-num="03847" class="">armor</st>, <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st> <st data-num="07392" class="">riding</st> on <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="02531" class="">desirable</st> <st data-num="0970" class="">young men</st>.

I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> she was <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st>; <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st> of them followed the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">path</st>.

But she <st data-num="03254 0413">increased</st> her <st data-num="08457" class="">prostitution</st>. She <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="02707" class="">carved</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="07023" class="">wall</st>, <st data-num="06754" class="">images</st> of the <st data-num="03778" class="">Chaldeans</st> <st data-num="02710" class="">carved</st> in <st data-num="08350" class="">bright red</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="02289" class="">wearing</st> <st data-num="0232" class="">belts</st> on their <st data-num="04975" class="">waists</st> and <st data-num="05628" class="">flowing</st> <st data-num="02871" class="">turbans</st> on their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="04758" class="">looking like</st> <st data-num="07991" class="">officers</st>, the <st data-num="01823" class="">image</st> of <st data-num="01121 0894">Babylonians</st><n id="1" /> whose <st data-num="04138" class="">native</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> is <st data-num="03778" class="">Chaldea</st>.

When <st data-num="05869" class="">she</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">saw</st> them,<n id="1" /> she <st data-num="05689" class="">lusted</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">after</st> them and <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="04397" class="">messengers</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them in <st data-num="03778" class="">Chaldea</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="01121 0894">Babylonians</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">crawled</st> into <st data-num="04904 01730">bed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her.<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> her with their <st data-num="08457" class="">lust</st>; after she was <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> by them, <st data-num="05315" class="">she</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03363" class="">became disgusted</st> with <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>.

When she <st data-num="08457" class="">lustfully</st> <st data-num="01540 01540">exposed</st> her <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05315" class="">I</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03363" class="">was disgusted</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> her, just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">I</st><n id="3" /> had <st data-num="05361" class="">been disgusted</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> her <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>.

Yet she <st data-num="07235" class="">increased</st> her <st data-num="08457" class="">prostitution</st>, <st data-num="02142" class="">remembering</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> of her <st data-num="05271" class="">youth</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> she <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.

She <st data-num="05689" class="">lusted</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">after</st> her <st data-num="06370" class="">lovers</st> there, whose <st data-num="06370" class="">genitals</st> were like <st data-num="01320" class="">those</st> of <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st><n id="1" /> and whose <st data-num="02231">emission</st> was like <st data-num="02231" class="">that</st> of <st data-num="05483" class="">stallions</st>.
This is how you assessed the obscene conduct of your youth, when the Egyptians fondled your nipples and squeezed your young breasts.
“Therefore, Oholibah, this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look here, I am about to stir up against you the lovers with whom you were disgusted; I will bring them against you from every side:

the <st data-num="01121 0894">Babylonians</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Chaldeans</st>, <st data-num="06489" class="">Pekod</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07772" class="">Shoa</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="06970" class="">Koa</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01121 0804">Assyrians</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them, <st data-num="02531" class="">desirable</st> <st data-num="0970" class="">young men</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="06346" class="">governors</st> and <st data-num="05461" class="">officials</st>, <st data-num="07991" class="">officers</st> and <st data-num="07121" class="">nobles</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="07392" class="">riding</st> on <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>.

They will <st data-num="0935 05921">attack</st><n id="1" /> you with <st data-num="02021" class="">weapons</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07393" class="">chariots</st>, <st data-num="01534" class="">wagons</st>, and with a <st data-num="05971" class="">huge</st> <st data-num="06951" class="">army</st>;<n id="3" /> they will <st data-num="07760" class="">array</st> themselves <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you <st data-num="05439" class="">on every side</st> with <st data-num="06793" class="">large shields</st>, <st data-num="04043" class="">small shields</st>, and <st data-num="06959" class="">helmets</st>. I will <st data-num="05414 06440">assign</st> them the <st data-num="04941" class="">task of judgment</st>;<n id="4" /> they will <st data-num="08199" class="">punish</st> you according to their <st data-num="04941" class="">laws</st>.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">direct</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="07068" class="">jealous anger</st> against you, and they will <st data-num="06213" class="">deal</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you in <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st>. They will <st data-num="05493" class="">cut off</st> your <st data-num="0639" class="">nose</st> and your <st data-num="0241" class="">ears</st>,<n id="2" /> and your <st data-num="0319" class="">survivors</st> will <st data-num="05307" class="">die</st><n id="3" /> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>. <st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> will <st data-num="03947" class="">seize</st> your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, and your <st data-num="0319" class="">survivors</st> will be <st data-num="0398" class="">consumed</st> by <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.

They will <st data-num="06584" class="">strip</st> your <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="06584" class="">off</st> you and <st data-num="03947" class="">take away</st> your <st data-num="08597" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">jewelry</st>.
So I will put an end to your obscene conduct and your prostitution that you have practiced in the land of Egypt. You will not seek their help or remember Egypt anymore.
“For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look here, I am about to deliver you over to those whom you hate, to those with whom you were disgusted.

They will <st data-num="06213 0854">treat</st> you with <st data-num="08135" class="">hatred</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">take away</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> you have <st data-num="03018" class="">labored for</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05800" class="">leave</st> you <st data-num="05903" class="">naked</st> and <st data-num="06181" class="">bare</st>. Your <st data-num="06172 02183">nakedness</st> will be <st data-num="01540" class="">exposed</st>, just as when you engaged in <st data-num="08457">prostitution</st> and <st data-num="02154" class="">obscene conduct</st>.<n id="2" />

I will <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these things</st> to you<n id="1" /> because you <st data-num="02181" class="">engaged in prostitution</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, <st data-num="05921 0834 02930">polluting</st> yourself with their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>.

You have <st data-num="01980" class="">followed</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">ways</st> of your <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, so I will <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> her <st data-num="03563" class="">cup</st> of judgment<n id="1" /> in your <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>.
This is what the Sovereign Lord says: ‘You will drink your sister’s deep and wide cup; you will be scorned and derided, for it holds a great deal.

You will be <st data-num="04390" class="">overcome</st> by<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07943" class="">drunkenness</st> and <st data-num="03015" class="">sorrow</st>. The <st data-num="03563" class="">cup</st> of your <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> <st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st> is a <st data-num="03563" class="">cup</st> of <st data-num="08047" class="">horror</st> and <st data-num="08077" class="">desolation</st>.
You will drain it dry, gnaw its pieces, and tear out your breasts, for I have spoken, declares the Sovereign Lord.’
“Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Because you have forgotten me and completely disregarded me, you must bear now the punishment for your obscene conduct and prostitution.”
The Lord said to me: “Son of man, are you willing to pronounce judgment on Oholah and Oholibah? Then declare to them their abominable deeds!

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> they have <st data-num="05003" class="">committed adultery</st>, and <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> is on their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>. They have <st data-num="05003" class="">committed adultery</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>; <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> their <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> they <st data-num="03205" class="">bore</st> to me,<n id="1" /> they have <st data-num="05674" class="">passed through the fire</st> as <st data-num="0402" class="">food</st> to their idols.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="05750" class="">Moreover</st>, they have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> to me: In the <st data-num="01931" class="">very same</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="02930" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st> and <st data-num="02490" class="">profaned</st> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st>.
On the same day they slaughtered their sons for their idols, they came to my sanctuary to desecrate it. This is what they have done in the middle of my house.
“They even sent for men from far away; when the messenger arrived, those men set out. For them you bathed, painted your eyes, and decorated yourself with jewelry.

You <st data-num="03427" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="03520" class="">magnificent</st> <st data-num="04296" class="">couch</st>, with a <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> <st data-num="06186" class="">arranged</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">where</st> you <st data-num="07760" class="">placed</st> my <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> and my <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>.

The <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of a <st data-num="07961" class="">carefree</st> <st data-num="01995" class="">crowd</st> accompanied her,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">including</st> <st data-num="07230 0120">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>;<n id="2" /> even <st data-num="05433" class="">Sabeans</st><n id="3" /> were <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> from the <st data-num="04057" class="">desert</st>. The sisters<n id="4" /> <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="06781" class="">bracelets</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="03027" class="">wrists</st> and <st data-num="08597" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="05850" class="">crowns</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st>.

Then I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> about the one <st data-num="01087" class="">worn out</st> by <st data-num="05004" class="">adultery</st>, ‘<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> they will <st data-num="02181" class="">commit</st> <st data-num="08457" class="">immoral acts</st> with <st data-num="01931" class="">her</st>.’

They <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her<n id="1" /> the way someone <st data-num="0935" class="">sleeps</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="0802 02181">prostitute</st>. <st data-num="03651" class="">In this way</st> they <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0170" class="">Oholah</st> and <st data-num="0172" class="">Oholibah</st>, <st data-num="02154" class="">promiscuous</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>.
But upright men will punish them appropriately for their adultery and bloodshed, because they are adulteresses and blood is on their hands.
“For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Bring up an army against them and subject them to terror and plunder.

That <st data-num="06951" class="">army</st> will <st data-num="07275 05921">pelt</st> them with <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> and <st data-num="01254" class="">slash</st> them with their <st data-num="02719" class="">swords</st>; they will <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> their <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> and <st data-num="0784 08313">burn</st> their <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="07673" class="">put an end to</st> the <st data-num="02154" class="">obscene conduct</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> will <st data-num="03256" class="">learn a lesson</st> from this and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">engage in</st> <st data-num="02154" class="">obscene conduct</st>.
They will repay you for your obscene conduct, and you will be punished for idol worship. Then you will know that I am the Sovereign Lord.”
